==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''[https://nahuatl.wired-humanities.org/content/itzcuintli Itzcuintli]'' is a name of {{w|Nahuatl}} origins, meaning "dog." It's also a calendrical marker in the 260-day divinatory calendar.
